name: Merchants (JoakimBlomqvist)
description:
OBS: Webversion only support 1920x1080. Fullscreen it to play.

Controls: Left click to navigate. Right click to move tile. Scroll wheel to zoom. Hold right click to move camera.

Info: 10 Weeks Summer project I made with creative crowd. Our goal was to make a playable vertical slice by the end of the summer.  

Made with a team of 5: CEO, Producer, Graphic artist, Creative director, and a Programmer.

My role: Programmer.

Tech: Unity C#
